animeDescription: Panda-Z chronicles the misadventures of Pan Taron and his giant robot Panda-Z, as they battle the evil Skull Panda and his Warunimal forces.(Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Satou, Takuya', 'Co-Director'], ['Kanbe, Mamoru', 'Director'], ['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', 'Sound Director'], ['JAM Project', 'Theme Song Performance']]
